Name: John Brick
About the game: COMPLETE YOUR REVENGE NO MATTER HOW MANY TIMES YOU FAIL Failing can become quite common on your journey, unless you really are the boogeyman. ARE YOU FAST ENOUGH? John Brick is a game with a very simple and challenging mechanics, just be quick between shooting and protecting yourself TOO HARD? By killing enemies, you get enough money to buy upgrades that will make it a lot easier. ... OR TOO EASY? The difficulty of the levels rises with the passage of the stages, with new mechanics. There will always be a new difficulty! CUSTOMIZE YOUR BRICK
